entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:08 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 02:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: SE 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of wet snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:10 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Periods of snow inland early in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:10 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 40 km/h diminishing to 20 late in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 8:10 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
